articles.title: Applewhite scores 24 to lift SC State past CSU 79-75
articles.description: BALTIMORE (AP) — Damani Applewhite scored 24 points and grabbed 11 rebounds and South Carolina State came from behind to beat Coppin State 79-75 in Saturday's Mid-Eastern Athletic Conference opener for both teams.

articles.title: Titans get back CB Jackson for wild-card matchup with Pats
articles.description: FOXBOROUGH, Mass. (AP) — The Tennessee Titans have cornerback Adoree’ Jackson back for their AFC wild-card matchup with the New England Patriots.
articles.content:

Jackson had missed the past four games after hurting a foot in a win Dec. 1 at Indianapolis.

articles.description: SAN DIEGO (AP) — Jessi Loera scored 13 points with seven assists and five rebounds and No. 17 Gonzaga overcame a season-high 23 turnovers to defeat San Diego 57-42 on Saturday for its 12th straight win.

articles.content:
